actor_awards.notes: Known as the 'Blonde Bombshell', she was famous for her high-energy musical performances and comedic timing. She replaced Judy Garland in the lead role of 'Annie Get Your Gun', earning a Golden Globe nomination. She was a top box office star for Paramount in the 1940s.

filmography.title: Annie Get Your Gun
filmography.role_description: The backwoods sharpshooter who rises to fame in Buffalo Bill's Wild West Show while falling for a rival marksman.
filmography.plot: The story of the great sharpshooter Annie Oakley, her rise to fame, and her romance with fellow shooter Frank Butler.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actress in a Motion Picture - Musical or Comedy

filmography.title: The Miracle of Morgan's Creek
filmography.role_description: A small-town girl who attends a farewell party for soldiers and wakes up married and pregnant, but can't remember the husband.
filmography.plot: A small-town girl attends a wild party for departing soldiers and wakes up married and pregnant, sparking a chaotic cover-up.

filmography.title: The Greatest Show on Earth
filmography.role_description: A talented and ambitious trapeze artist competing for the center ring while caught in a romantic triangle.
filmography.plot: The dramatic lives of trapeze artists, a clown, and an elephant trainer play out against the backdrop of a traveling circus.

filmography.title: The Perils of Pauline
filmography.role_description: A fictionalized version of the silent film serial queen Pearl White, showcasing her rise from sweatshop worker to star.
filmography.plot: A biographical film about Pearl White, who rises from a sewing machine operator to become a famous silent movie star known for her stunts.

filmography.title: The Fleet's In
filmography.role_description: A man-hungry singer who performs the show-stopping number 'Arthur Murray Taught Me Dancing in a Hurry'.
filmography.plot: A shy sailor becomes a lady-killer after a publicity photo makes him look like a hero.

filmography.title: Incendiary Blonde
filmography.role_description: The famous 1920s nightclub hostess and entertainer known for her phrase 'Hello, Sucker!'.
filmography.plot: The biographical story of Texas Guinan, a rodeo rider who became a Broadway star and a speakeasy hostess.

filmography.title: Here Come the Waves
filmography.role_description: Twin sisters—one a serious WAVE recruit and the other a dizzy singer—who both get involved with Bing Crosby.
filmography.plot: A popular crooner gets drafted into the Navy and gets mixed up with twin sisters who have joined the WAVES.

filmography.title: Let's Dance
filmography.role_description: A war widow and former dancer who fights her wealthy in-laws for custody of her son, aided by her former partner.
filmography.plot: A former dance partner helps a war widow fight her wealthy grandmother-in-law for custody of her son.

filmography.title: Red, Hot and Blue
filmography.role_description: An aspiring actress who witnesses a murder and tries to solve it to boost her career.
filmography.plot: An actress trying to make it big gets mixed up with gangsters and a murder mystery.

filmography.title: The Stork Club
filmography.role_description: A hat-check girl at the famous nightclub who saves an old man's life and is anonymously rewarded.
filmography.plot: A hat-check girl saves a wealthy man from drowning and he decides to become her secret benefactor.

filmography.title: Dream Girl
filmography.role_description: A young woman who escapes her mundane life through vivid and elaborate daydreams.
filmography.plot: A woman who runs a bookstore constantly retreats into her own fantasy world to escape her real-life problems.

filmography.title: And the Angels Sing
filmography.role_description: One of four singing sisters who wants to go solo and gets involved with a bandleader.
filmography.plot: A bandleader tries to exploit a quartet of singing sisters, but romance and family dynamics complicate his plans.

filmography.title: Happy Go Lucky
filmography.role_description: A loud and energetic singer trying to find a rich husband for her friend.
filmography.plot: A cigarette girl travels to a Caribbean resort posing as a wealthy heiress to snag a rich husband.

filmography.title: Star Spangled Rhythm
filmography.role_description: Appears as herself performing the number 'I'm Doing It for Defense' in this all-star revue.
filmography.plot: A Paramount gatekeeper pretends to be the studio boss to impress his son and his son's friends.

filmography.title: Somebody Loves Me
filmography.role_description: A biographical role playing the vaudeville star Blossom Seeley.
filmography.plot: The career of vaudeville star Blossom Seeley and her romance with Benny Fields.

filmography.title: Cross My Heart
filmography.role_description: A compulsive liar who confesses to a murder she didn't commit to help her lawyer boyfriend's career.
filmography.plot: A showgirl with a habit of lying confesses to a murder to help her boyfriend get the publicity of defending her, not knowing the real killer is still out there.

filmography.title: Spring Reunion
filmography.role_description: A lonely woman attending her 15th high school reunion in a rare dramatic role. Her final feature film.
filmography.plot: At a high school reunion, the 'most popular girl' and the 'boy most likely to succeed' rediscover each other and face their disappointments.

filmography.title: Sailor Beware
filmography.role_description: Dean Martin's girlfriend who warns him against dating the guest star (Corinne Calvet).
filmography.plot: Two sailors on leave in Hawaii get involved in a bet that one of them can date a famous movie star.

filmography.title: Duffy's Tavern
filmography.role_description: Appears as herself in this musical comedy featuring a host of Paramount stars.
filmography.plot: The staff of a tavern try to help a record manufacturer whose plant is facing bankruptcy.
